about_the_game:
Pack a punch with the Crime Boss: Rockay City - Jupiter Character Pack!

Unlock Roidiac Jupiter and take your heists to the next level with a unique loadout and unique perks for Jupiter.

  • Primary Weapon: Mossberg shotgun with undermounted grenade launcher.

  • Secondary Weapon: Perun with red dot sight.

  • Melee Weapon: Knuckle duster.

  • Mule Perk which allows Jupiter and her team to carry 3 bags AND use their primary weapon.

  • Adrenaline Equipment - regenerate health by killing enemies with a bonus for using the Knuckle Duster.

  • Base health is higher for Roidiac Jupiter compared to original Jupiter.

Base version of Jupiter will be unlocked with this DLC if the character has not already been unlocked as part of the progression system.

All versions of Jupiter will be playable in both Single-Player and Multiplayer game modes.
detailed_description:
Pack a punch with the Crime Boss: Rockay City - Jupiter Character Pack!

Unlock Roidiac Jupiter and take your heists to the next level with a unique loadout and unique perks for Jupiter.

  • Primary Weapon: Mossberg shotgun with undermounted grenade launcher.

  • Secondary Weapon: Perun with red dot sight.

  • Melee Weapon: Knuckle duster.

  • Mule Perk which allows Jupiter and her team to carry 3 bags AND use their primary weapon.

  • Adrenaline Equipment - regenerate health by killing enemies with a bonus for using the Knuckle Duster.

  • Base health is higher for Roidiac Jupiter compared to original Jupiter.

Base version of Jupiter will be unlocked with this DLC if the character has not already been unlocked as part of the progression system.

All versions of Jupiter will be playable in both Single-Player and Multiplayer game modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 570, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB, AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB, or Intel Arc A770, 16 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
